long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A test version of the WikiTree Browser Extension.

The WikiTree Browser Extension adds advanced features to WikiTree.com.

These include:
- A list of your unfinished drafts.
- Collapsible descendants trees.
- Family timelines.
- Tools to make editing templates easier.
- Extra checks when editing a biography.

and much more!
